name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BMS Kajabi Font And Icon Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kajabi extension to add custom font and icon to pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is built to increase the productivity on Kajabi platform. It helps users add custom fonts and list icons to their funnel pages.
